author: Simon Difford
description: Stirred down and boozy, corn notes from the whiskey are amplified by the bittersweet aperitif liqueur and aromatised wine.
name: Three Blind Mice
recipeIngredient: 30 ml Cynar or other carciofo amaro

recipeInstructions.text: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass (preferably over a chunk of block ice)
